includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The seemingly perfect lives of the Wisteria Lane residents is shaken by the arrival of a new neighbour. Smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Life on Wisteria Lane is shaken by the arrival of a new neighbour.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The seemingly perfect lives of the Wisteria Lane residents is shaken by the arrival of a new neighbour. Smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.

includedIn.title: Desperate Housewives
includedIn.synopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Four housewives' lives are devastated when their friend commits suicide, but that's just the start of a string of shocking events on Wisteria Lane.
